options.name: Reaction: Dragon's Honor
options.description: When someone tells you a lie, you immediately know it as a Reaction. You can call them out, dealing 1d6 Psychic damage to the liar.

options.name: Draconic Presence
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and your draconic heritage grants you advantage when negotiating with dragons or dragonkin.

options.name: Arcane Heritage
options.description: Gain +1 Magic and you can understand the basic meaning of any draconic script or runes.
